resources.string: Neko requires access to all files in Android 11 to download chapters, and create automatic backups. \n\nOn the next screen, enable \"Allow access to manage all files.\"
Neko requires access to all files to download chapters. Tap here, then enable \"Allow access to manage all files.\"
Categories to update when manually refreshing
Manga in this category will moved into the default category.
A category with that name already exists
Press and hold to edit a category
Your library is empty, add series to your library from the browse tab.
No matches found for your current filters
Move collapsed dynamic categories to bottom
When grouping library by sources, status, etc.
Can also be found by expanding library filters
Tap the Library icon to show filters
only %d manga needed to be migrated
Update only when the conditions are met
Update library faster. Skips updating manga metadata etc
When sorting alphabetically, sort ignoring articles (a, an, the) at the start of manga titles
Categories to include in global update
Refresh covers in library as well when updating library
Certain buttons can be found in other places if disabled here
Search tips will show up periodically. Long press the suggestion to search it.
This will remove the read date of \"%1$s\". Are you sure?
This will remove the read date of this chapter. Are you sure?
No recently read or updated manga
Press and hold can also reset chapter history
Are you sure? All history will be lost.
Show read chapters in Grouped and All
The image could not be decoded
Use this image as cover art?
Changing this will reset the reading mode for this series
The amount of pages to preload when reading. Higher values will result in a smoother reading experience, at the cost of higher cache and network usage.
Reduces banding, but may impact performance
Smart (based on page and theme but use black)
If disabled, the transition page will be skipped if the next chapter is loaded
Cutout area behavior only applies in portrait mode with certain scale types
While using automatic page layout, you can still switch between layouts while reading without overriding this setting
Longstrips are meant to be read in webtoon mode smh
Creates folders according to manga title
Sensitivity for hiding menu on scroll

plurals.name: missing_chapters_warning
plurals.item: Skipping 1 chapter, either the source is missing it or it has been filtered out
Skipping %d chapters, either the source is missing them or they have been filtered out

resources.string: Manga must be in your library to edit
All read manga (includes non library entries)

plurals.name: deleted_chapters
plurals.item: A chapter has been removed from the source:\n%2$s\nDelete its download?

%1$s chapters have been removed from the source:
%2$s

Delete their downloads?

resources.string: One-way sync to update the chapter progress in tracking services. Set up tracking for individual manga entries from their tracking button.
Services that provide enhanced features for specific sources. Manga are automatically tracked when added to your library.
Update tracking when marked as read
Manga URL not set, please click title and select manga again
Tracker cannot be removed from %1$s while offline
Keep both on %1$s and only replace locally
Please log in to MAL again
Select a source, then select an item to migrate
Include extra search parameter when searching
Use source with the most chapters (slower)
To show this screen again, go to Settings -> Sources.
No chapters found, this manga cannot be used for migration
Secure screen hides app contents when switching apps and block screenshots
By default, side navigation is used for certain phones and small tablets when in landscape, and always shows on larger tablets
Show a larger, expanded toolbar at the top of most pages (does not show on smaller devices regardless of setting)
Includes recently read, updated, and added series
When there\'s no new chapters, the series\' details will open instead
Can be used to restore current library
Invalid backup file type: %1$s\nIt should end with ".proto.gz" or ".json".
Backup does not contain any manga.
No library entries to back up
Restore uses sources to fetch data, carrier costs may apply.\n\nMake sure you have installed all necessary extensions and are logged in to sources and tracking services before restoring.
Data from the backup file will be restored.\n\nYou will need to install any missing extensions and log in to tracking services afterwards to use them.
Automatic backups are highly recommended. You should keep copies in other places as well.
What do you want to backup?
Backup/restore may not function properly if MIUI Optimization is disabled.
Saves error logs to a file for sharing with the developers
Some manufacturers have additional app restrictions that kill background services. This website has more info on how to fix it.
Requires app restart to take effect

plurals.name: cache_cleared
plurals.item: Cache cleared. %d file has been deleted
Cache cleared. %d files have been deleted

resources.string: Delete manga and chapters that are not in your library
Clear database of manga and chapters NOT in Library
This is not reversible and the read chapters (unless checked below) and the progress will be lost.
Updates covers, genres, description and manga status information
Updates status, score and last chapter read from the tracking services
Delete non-existent, partially downloaded, and read chapter folders
Disable this if you are experiencing issues with updating or restoring your library
Delete old and unused cached covers of manga in your library that has been updated.\nCurrently using: %1$s
Clear cached covers not in library
Delete all covers cached that are not in your library \nCurrently using: %1$s
Helps fix any bugs. No sensitive data will be sent
Username or password cannot be blank
Downloads can be cancelled by swiping them away\nSwipe this tip to dismiss it
Visit the recents tab to access the download queue. You can also double tap or press and hold for quicker access
Couldn\'t download chapters due to low disk space
Could not download chapter due to unexpected error
Only works on entries in library and if the current chapter plus the next one are already downloaded
Delete downloaded chapters if the source has removed the chapter online
Delete during global updates, ask on chapters page
Library empty, unable to generate stats
No data to show in chart
No data found for your current filters
Please update the WebView app for better compatibility
%1$s/%2$s manga were skipped because they were not MangaDex
"Comments not available on MangaDex at this time"
Merge another source to fill potential missing chapters
Tap here to show similar manga
Make the backdrop cover extra large
Using cached source, can\'t open this chapter
MangaDex appears to be down, or under heavy load
Cannot refresh this is a V3 manga entry
Don\'t forget to try looking for \nSimilar Manga. Click the
icon on the manga info screen
Syncing Manga to Follows List complete
Not logged into MangaDex cannot sync
For more information and to view the source code:\n%s
Error trying to load/process cache manga
Choose which ratings to show in results. Choosing none is the same as choosing all.
Choose which ratings you want to auto track (when enabled). Choosing none is the same as choosing all.
Pulls Manga from your MangaDex Follows List into your Neko library if they are not already added.
Syncs your entire library to your MangaDex Follows List with a Reading Status
Use the new api cache server
enable this if MangaDex starts breaking (meaning they removed old api server)
Two way automatic sync of read/unread status of a chapter with MangaDex. This only pulls read from MangaDex to prevent accidentally marking chapters unread
Show Content rating filter in search
Use Image Servers with Port 443 only
"Enable to only request image servers that use port 443. This allows users with stricter firewall restrictions to access MangaDex images"
Add to library as planned to read
When enabled manga added to your library will be updated with Plan To Read Status on MangaDex
Recommended to not use at this time, this was a legacy feature for V3 of MangaDex
This will download 5MB file. You only need to download it once. If you already downloaded just dismiss this dialog.
Data from the backup file will be restored.\n\n If this a pre v5 backup you will need to v5 migrate after you restore.
Changing this can impact app performance. Force-restart app after changing. Log file is stored at /Neko/logs.
This will force the download cache to recalculate. Use after you migrated to v5 or if you copied downloads outside of this app
Saves error logs to a file for sharing with the developers
This will start legacy id migration (Note: This uses data)
Perform migration from old MangaDex to V5 site. For real though why you still need this?
